src:
Persebaya Disanksi Tanpa Suporter, Bonek Mania Tetap Berangkat ke Bogor
07 Nov 2019, 22:56 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pendukung Persebaya Surabaya, Bonek Mania tetap berangkat ke Bogor untuk memberi dukungan kepada Green Force pada laga melawan PS Tira Persikabo. Jumlahnya bahkan mencapai ribuan.
Hal itu disampaikan dirigen Tribun Kidul, Agus Bimbim Tessy. Menurutnya, para suporter tetap nekat untuk berangkat, meski sudah dilarang karena Persebaya sedang menjalani sanksi.
"Susahnya dari teman-teman Bonek tidak bisa dilarang, akhirnya sudah banyak yang berangkat ke Bogor," kata Tessy kepada Bola.net, Kamis (7/11/2019).
"Sudah sekitar dua ribu sampai tiga ribuan yang berangkat ke Bogor," imbuh pentolan Bonek Slenge'an tersebut.
Dikatakan Tessy, dirinya memang tidak bisa menahan keinginan Bonek untuk berangkat ke Bogor. Dia juga tidak berani mengeluarkan imbauan kepada rekan-rekannya tersebut.
"Kita juga bingung, nanti saya mau bikin omongan kayak gitu, nanti saya yang diserang sama anak-anak," jelasnya.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Persebaya Disanksi Without Supporters, Bonek Mania Still Departs to Bogor
Nov 7 2019, 22:56 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Supporters of Persebaya Surabaya, Bonek Mania still went to Bogor to provide support to the Green Force in the match against PS Tira Persikabo. The number even reached thousands.
This was conveyed by the conductor of Kidun Tribun, Agus Bimbim Tessy. According to him, the fans remained determined to leave, even though it had been banned because Persebaya was undergoing sanctions.
"The difficulty of Bonek's friends cannot be banned, so many have left for Bogor," Tessy told Bola.net, Thursday (11/07/2019).
"About two thousand to three thousand have left for Bogor," added the Bonek Slenge'an frontman.
Tessy said that she could not resist Bonek's desire to go to Bogor. He also did not dare to issue an appeal to his colleagues.
"We are also confused, later I want to make a talk like that, later I will be attacked by children," he explained.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters
